description: Intermediate Korean II challenges students to use Korean in Real-life situations in a culturally appropriate manner. Students will develop their communicative competence on various topics such as birthday invitation, barbershops and beauty salons, recreation and hobbies, Korean holidays, hospitals and drugstore, and majors and jobs. In addition, students will practice dynamic language functions throught grammar as well as experience culture in contextualized and authentic ways through movies, video clips, and food. Students will engage in a variety of activities such as making a movie and online interaction such as second life. The proficiency of intermediate mid/high of national standards will be achieved in interpersonal communication, interpretive communication, presentational communication, comparison, community, and cultur in the covered topics.
name: INTERMEDIATE KOREAN II
